page.title: 10INFORMATION SYSTEMS T/HEAD
page.content: { {VOTERS' ROLL.}AN ANNUAL CANVASS IS MADE IN THE TEVIOTHEAD DISTRICT OF ALL PERSONS RESIDING THERE AT 10TH OCTOBER OVER THE AGE OF 16 AND A HALF YEARS. NAMES, AND IN RELEVANT CASES, DATE OF BIRTH OF PERSONS, ARE RECORDED AND ALL DETAILS ARE THEN MADE UP INTO THE REGISTER OF ELECTORS. A COPY OF THIS REGISTER FOR THE TEVIOTHEAD DISTRICT IS THEN SENT OUT BY THE BORDERS REGIONAL COUNCIL ELECTORAL REGISTRATION OFFICER AND THIS IS HUNG UP IN THE TEVIOTHEAD VILLAGE HALL FOR INFORMATION. AT TEVIOTHEAD SCHOOL, PUPILS ARE TAUGHT TO USE A{COMPUTER.}
